result.markdown:
---
title: "Predict dengue diagnose"
subtitle: "by symptoms and clinical condition"
author: Raphael Saldanha
date: last-modified
---


## Packages


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
library(arrow)
library(knitr)
library(lubridate)
library(tidymodels)
library(finetune)
library(tictoc)
library(vip)
```
:::


## Data


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
# Data sources
files_list <- c(
  "../dengue-data/parquets/dengue_2016.parquet",
  "../dengue-data/parquets/dengue_2017.parquet",
  "../dengue-data/parquets/dengue_2018.parquet",
  "../dengue-data/parquets/dengue_2019.parquet",
  "../dengue-data/parquets/dengue_2020.parquet",
  "../dengue-data/parquets/dengue_2021.parquet"
)

# Independent variables
x_vars <- c("FEBRE", "MIALGIA", "CEFALEIA", 
            "EXANTEMA", "VOMITO", "NAUSEA", 
            "DOR_COSTAS", "CONJUNTVIT", 
            "ARTRITE", "ARTRALGIA", "PETEQUIA_N", 
            "LEUCOPENIA", "LACO", "DOR_RETRO", 
            "DIABETES", "HEMATOLOG", "HEPATOPAT", 
            "HEPATOPAT", "RENAL", "HIPERTENSA",
            "ACIDO_PEPT", "AUTO_IMUNE")

# Prepare data
dengue <- arrow::open_dataset(sources = files_list) %>%
  # Select variables
  select(all_of(c("CLASSI_FIN", "DT_SIN_PRI", x_vars))) %>%
  # Filter out "Inconclusivo" cases
  filter(CLASSI_FIN != "Inconclusivo") %>%
  # Collect data from parquet files
  collect() %>%
  # Prepare variables
  mutate(CLASSI_FIN = case_when(
    CLASSI_FIN != "Descartado" ~ TRUE,
    .default = FALSE
  )) %>%
  mutate(CLASSI_FIN = as.factor(CLASSI_FIN)) %>%
  mutate(DT_SIN_PRI = as_date(DT_SIN_PRI)) %>%
  mutate_at(.vars = x_vars, .funs = ~ . == "Sim") 
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
# Smaller dataset for tests
dengue <- sample_n(dengue, 1000)
```
:::


## Modeling

### Train and test dataset split


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
set.seed(123)

dengue_split <- dengue %>%
  initial_split(strata = CLASSI_FIN, prop = 3/4)

dengue_train <- training(dengue_split)
dengue_test <- testing(dengue_split)

set.seed(234)
dengue_folds <- vfold_cv(dengue_train, v = 10, strata = CLASSI_FIN)
```
:::


### Recipes


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
# All variables
dengue_rec_1 <- 
  recipe(CLASSI_FIN ~ . , data = dengue_train) %>%
  step_date(DT_SIN_PRI, features = c("month", "week"), keep_original_cols = FALSE) %>%
  step_integer(all_predictors())
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
# Only symptons and health conditions
dengue_rec_2 <- 
  recipe(CLASSI_FIN ~ . , data = dengue_train) %>%
  step_rm(DT_SIN_PRI) %>%
  step_integer(all_predictors())
```
:::


### Specifications

#### XGB


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
xgb_spec <-
  boost_tree(
    trees = tune(),
    min_n = tune(),
    mtry = tune(),
    learn_rate = 0.01
  ) %>%
  set_engine("xgboost") %>%
  set_mode("classification")
```
:::


#### Decision tree


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
cart_spec <-
  decision_tree(
    cost_complexity = tune(), 
    min_n = tune()
  ) %>% 
  set_engine("rpart") %>% 
  set_mode("classification")
```
:::


#### Logistic regression


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
log_spec <- 
  logistic_reg() %>%
  set_engine("glm") %>%
  set_mode("classification")
```
:::


### Workflows


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
all_workflows <- 
  workflow_set(
    preproc = list(recipe_1 = dengue_rec_1, recipe_2 = dengue_rec_2),
    models = list(xgb = xgb_spec, cart = cart_spec)
  )
```
:::


### Tuning


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
doParallel::registerDoParallel()

race_ctrl <-
   control_race(
      save_pred = FALSE,
      parallel_over = "everything",
      save_workflow = FALSE
   )

tic()
race_results <- 
  all_workflows %>%
  workflow_map(
    "tune_race_anova",
    seed = 345,
    resamples = dengue_folds,
    grid = 15,
    control = race_ctrl
  )
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
i Creating pre-processing data to finalize unknown parameter: mtry
i Creating pre-processing data to finalize unknown parameter: mtry
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
toc()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
114.535 sec elapsed
```
:::
:::


#### Race metrics


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
train_rank_results <- rank_results(race_results, rank_metric = "roc_auc")

train_rank_results
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
# A tibble: 84 × 9
   wflow_id     .config     .metric  mean std_err     n preprocessor model  rank
   <chr>        <chr>       <chr>   <dbl>   <dbl> <int> <chr>        <chr> <int>
 1 recipe_1_xgb Preprocess… accura… 0.597  0.0172    10 recipe       boos…     1
 2 recipe_1_xgb Preprocess… roc_auc 0.642  0.0236    10 recipe       boos…     1
 3 recipe_1_xgb Preprocess… accura… 0.597  0.0192    10 recipe       boos…     2
 4 recipe_1_xgb Preprocess… roc_auc 0.639  0.0172    10 recipe       boos…     2
 5 recipe_1_xgb Preprocess… accura… 0.596  0.0197    10 recipe       boos…     3
 6 recipe_1_xgb Preprocess… roc_auc 0.637  0.0220    10 recipe       boos…     3
 7 recipe_1_xgb Preprocess… accura… 0.590  0.0203    10 recipe       boos…     4
 8 recipe_1_xgb Preprocess… roc_auc 0.637  0.0229    10 recipe       boos…     4
 9 recipe_1_xgb Preprocess… accura… 0.594  0.0200    10 recipe       boos…     5
10 recipe_1_xgb Preprocess… roc_auc 0.637  0.0217    10 recipe       boos…     5
# ℹ 74 more rows
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
autoplot(race_results, metric = "roc_auc")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](dengue_classification_symptoms_conditions_multi_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-13-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


### Last fit


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
selection_train <- train_rank_results %>%
  arrange(-mean) %>%
  pull(wflow_id) %>%
  first()

selection_train
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] "recipe_1_xgb"
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
best_results <- race_results %>%
  extract_workflow_set_result(selection_train) %>%
  select_best("accuracy")

best_results
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
# A tibble: 1 × 4
   mtry trees min_n .config              
  <int> <int> <int> <chr>                
1    10  1190    16 Preprocessor1_Model07
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
last_fit <- race_results %>%
  extract_workflow(selection_train) %>%
  finalize_workflow(best_results) %>%
  last_fit(dengue_split)
```
:::


### Evaluate on test


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
collect_metrics(last_fit)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
# A tibble: 2 × 4
  .metric  .estimator .estimate .config             
  <chr>    <chr>          <dbl> <chr>               
1 accuracy binary         0.629 Preprocessor1_Model1
2 roc_auc  binary         0.632 Preprocessor1_Model1
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
collect_predictions(last_fit) %>%
    conf_mat(CLASSI_FIN, .pred_class)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
          Truth
Prediction FALSE TRUE
     FALSE    61   39
     TRUE     54   97
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
last_fit %>%
  extract_fit_engine() %>%
  vip()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](dengue_classification_symptoms_conditions_multi_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-19-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
